name: Ex Military Truck Driving
description:
Ex Military Truck Driving is one of the army training game where you test military transport skills. Choose from a variety of army trucks. Start playing army truck driver. Army truck driving simulator with military transport missions. Time to drive in the warfield. Deliver army cargo, weapons, ammunition. Keep up the army supplies in army extreme truck driving. Here you will be able to driving US Army grand trucks. The heavy military trucks are fun to drive in the battlezone.
Features:
- Realistic game sounds
- Simulator like controls
- Easy to learn and drive
- Enjoy cool background music
- Multiple army truck to choose
- Drive in warzone between base and infantry.
